department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: The decor is of entwined serpents on a granulated ground.  The outer rim is adorned with a band of raised string pattern bound at intervals with plain, slanting bands.  A feline mask appears at the end of the lynch pin, which is pierced at both ends for the passage of a lashing for the pin.  Patina bright green.
object_name: Axle cap from chariot wheel, one of a pair
title: Axle cap from chariot wheel, one of a pair
